title: An Essay: the popular arts today
creator_credit: Saul Bass, Elaine Bass, Jim Ragan and Saul Bass Films
brief_description: A vignette on popular arts in America through the use of live-action, animation and special effects. Portrays Hollywood movies as a nightmare realm of casual predation and fatuous pomposity. Focuses also on comic book heros, television, music, books and magazines.
